betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The Thaumometer is cool and all, but having to hold a giant lens in front of your face to see nodes is starting to get a bit tiresome. Since it §ois§r a lens, couldn't you make a pair of goggles out of them?

Turns out that your new wand is capable of channeling the amount of Vis necessary to do just that. When worn Goggles of Revealing will reveal nodes just like when you're holding a Thaumometer. The goggles also make it easier to channel Vis, although you're not sure that's purely a result of being able to actually see it fully.

That all said, to make the goggles small enough to fit on your head you had to give up on its scanning ability. So you'll still need a Thaumometer for that. You're sure there's ways to improve upon this design, or swap out the lenses for ones with an additional function, though.

With TC Node Tracker remembering nodes is trivial. The default key is I. You can select from the list of nodes you have scanned, and an in-world arrow will show you the way. You can also sort the list.

§3There's quests for the electric version of Goggles of Revealing on the ...Without Dying tab. Though you will need an infusion altar to craft them.
